items.text: Have a look at View.setVisibility(View.GONE / View.VISIBLE / View.INVISIBLE).
items.href: android - How to change visibility of layout programmatically - Stack Overflow

items.text: Note that LinearLayout is a ViewGroup which in turn is a View.
items.href: android - How to change visibility of layout programmatically - Stack Overflow

items.text: That is, you may very well call, for instance, myLinearLayout.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE).
items.href: android - How to change visibility of layout programmatically - Stack Overflow
